QuestData.Title: A Custom Order
QuestData.Description:
I think it's safe to say that our little friend is no long a hatchling, but a fully grown aqir! He's grown so much, in fact, he could even carry you into battle.
Wait, that's a marvelous idea!
You should speak with Blacksmith Abasi about getting a saddle made.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Blacksmith Abasi in Ramkahen.
